website_summaries.verdict: A convenient solution for mixing a single bottle's worth of formula when you are out running errands or at a restaurant.
pros: Mixing wand will fit in virtually any size of bottle
Automatic settings spin the mixer at a consistent rate to keep the formula powder properly mixed without forming any clumps
Good for other foods and drinks as well
Portable enough to fit in a pocket or purse
cons: Stirring wand can be difficult to clean after mixing certain foods and drinks

customer_reviews.title: A fast easy way to make Bulletproof Coffee (also known as butter coffee)
customer_reviews.text: I am using this for mixing coconut oil, or butter with hot coffee. The result is a frothy, latte-like mixture! Prior to getting this product I would pour the hot coffee and butter/coconut oil into a blender for a few seconds and then pour it back into the coffee mug. This saves a step, leave the coffee warmer, and gives the same results. Less mess, less washing out the blender.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Useless
customer_reviews.text: Read the product specs carefully. I did not. This product is virtually useless junk. It moves the protein powder around but doesn't really blend it-there's still plenty of clumps. The blender stick design and its short length limits the container to be used. Perhaps it could be used to stir baby food or stir a small cup of matcha tea. It gets one star for being quite portable and easy to clean

customer_reviews.title: Great little whipper but not returnable.

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted a little over 8 months!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for making pudding mostly. I bought one at Walmart previously and it lasted more than 4 years and I loved it. It was so quick to pull out of a drawer and mix. It looked EXACTLY like this one. This one worked just as well and was comparably priced, ($8.99+tax) from Amazon, but this one only lasted about 8 months, and now when I looked at "reordering" it's $13.96+tax... The milk is completely mixed and frothed in the mug in a few seconds. I've also used it for protein powder (but I prefer to use a shaker bottle), and it works GREAT for Mexican cocoa. Doesn't work as well on thick liquid and will stall out if I try to use with mixtures that are too solid. It runs a LONG time on a couple of batteries. And, the design of the mixing fork is so simple, I just wipe it off after each use.

customer_reviews.title: The best!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a formula/bottle mixer after my original bottle mixer died. Super powerful, fast and have used it for multiple things. I made whipped cream the other day and this little baby did it! I love the carrying case to keep it clean while in the diaper bag. It also has two mixing whips so I can easily throw it in the dishwasher and still have a mixer at hand. GREAT BUY!!!!

customer_reviews.title: If You Get A Lemon, Just Have It Replaced

Easy pop in two AA batteries, works with my rechargeables. Just keep triangle end below liquid top so not spray; and off bottom of vessel so not grind loud & burn up motor. Don't overmix dairy--that unnaturally homogenizes, making the molecules unhealthily nano.
